explains: v. 打开（unwrap 的过去分词）

sentences.en: When we unwrapped the cases, we found the goods partly soaked by rain.
sentences.cn: 打开箱子的时候，我们发现货物被雨水浸了个半透。

sentences.en: I untied the bow and unwrapped the small box.
sentences.cn: 我解开蝴蝶结，拆开那个小盒子的包装。

sentences.en: When he had unwrapped her, he turned homewards with his sled.
sentences.cn: 他解开包着她的袋子，就驾着雪橇回家了。
